Package de.fzi.replica.comm

Interface Summary
CommManager CommManager can handle multiple connections to other peers and provides access to all ECF components relevant to the Replica project through the Connection interface.
CommManagerFactory  
Connection Represents a connection to a peer.
Connection.ConnectionContext The context of a connection encapsulates all connection configuration data and provides access to Connection.ConnectionContext.ConnectionActivity objects.
Connection.ConnectionContext.ConnectionActivity A connection activity is a list of ConnectionActivityStates.
Connection.ConnectionContext.ConnectionActivity.ConnectionActivityStateChangeEvent  
Connection.ConnectionContext.ConnectionActivity.ConnectionActivityStateChangeListener  
 

Class Summary
CommManagerImpl  
ConnectionImpl  
DefaultCommManagerFactory
